#summary Steps to follow to release library.

= Introduction =

Steps to follow to release library.


= Details =
  * Add configuration to %USER_HOME%/.m2/settings.xml or %M2_HOME%/conf/settings.xml
{{{
...
    <servers>
      <server>
       <id>googlecode</id>
       <username>yourlogin</username>
       <password>yourpassword</password>
      </server>    
    </servers>
...
}}}
  * Run
{{{
mvn release:prepare
mvn release:perform
}}}
